Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated interfaces and new utilities, games, and applications.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Display Size - 1024 x 768 | 64 MB RAM | 57 MB Hard drive space

English.Keywords: office, suite, alternative, productivity, software, word processing, spreadsheet
English.Char_Desc_45: A free and useful office suite for everyone.
English.Char_Desc_80: A free and useful office suite for everyone.
English.Char_Desc_250: This office suite runs on all Windows platforms and all hardware systems. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
English.Char_Desc_450:
This office suite runs on all Windows platforms and all hardware systems. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
This office suite runs on all Windows platforms and all hardware systems. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility. This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few.
The graphical-user-interface has been made into a more iconic-toolbar, mouse centric type of interface. This increases user-interaction speed and user productivity. This office suite was created to be as useful as possible to who ever needed an office suite, and not to battle it out with the competition or try to replace them. So... if you enjoy a more uncluttered desktop, cleaner looking application interfaces, and faster software interaction, then this office suite is for You!
Minimum System Requirements:
- 1024 x 768 Display Size - Windows 95 / 98 / ME / 2000 / XP - Compatible with MS Office, MS Works 1-8, and all Java based office suites like StarOffice,OpenOffice etc. - {rtf,doc,txt,xls}
Highlights:
- Full 32-Bit Software - No Annual License Fees - Easy Installation ( No Restarts ) - Iconic and Mouse-Centric Interface - Includes only these seven dictionaries - American, British, Dutch, German, French, Italian, and Spanish.
New Concepts:
- Floating Clock - Instant System Access - New Desktop Taskbar - Mac Dock for PC - VOIP Communication Software - VOIP PC Phone - New Search Engine with Quick Default File Extension Searches - Search and Find.
Installation Instructions:
- As with all installations, please create a restore point before installing any software - After installing the office suite, drag your Windows Taskbar to the Top of your screen - Go to your Startup folder and run the "Clock" or "Desktop Startup" shortcuts.
